Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4300 WILSON BOULEVARD,11TH FLOOR, ARLINGTON, Virginia, 22203, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: AES is a global power company operating across 14 countries and 4 continents. Its current generation portfolio consists of over 31 gigawtts of generation, with the generation mix composed of renewables (43%), gas (32%), coal (23%), and oil (2%). The company has 3.5 gigawatts of generation under construction. AES has majority ownership and operates six electric utilities distributing power to 2.6 million customers.

value.name: Ricardo Manuel Falú
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
